评论详情: I have gotten so many compliments on this sweater. Sleeves are slightly long but still cute .

This sweater is perfect for layering! The crochet hollow-out design is super cute and makes it great for transitioning between seasons. It’s lightweight but still cozy, and it works well with jeans, skirts, or shorts. Love how versatile and stylish it is!
This arrived in a bag that was clearly re-use.  The sweater had makeup around the collar and had already been worn by someone else. Absolutely disgusting.
The style is super cute but runs big
I love this! Super cute over a cami! Would definitely buy again.  Love the casual style and colors.  Sleeves give it some interest and fun.
Super cute
Very cute. Pretty good quality too. True to size but definitely meant to fit oversized.
Such a great sweater/top. Fits great.

评论概述: Felt like a beach cover up

This sweater is super cute and comfortable. I highly recommend.
This sweater is great to throw over a tank in the cool evenings of fall. The quality is nice and it hangs nicely. I ordered the gold flame and it is a nice rust color.

I have this in two colors already. I bought the white for engagement photos and it was perfect with jeans and brown booties. I run very warm so a holey sweater is perfect for me, dressing for fall but need a breeze, this is the sweater for that!
Perfect for the price  Easy bandeau or white or colored tank underneath .  I did a medium and was able to gently dry it . Before it was long and I’m tall ish so I was pleased with the dried result .
The sleeves were extremely long! Had to cut them and they were still way to long:(

I was on the fence about this sweater for a few weeks actually. I held it in my cart but never purchased. I finally did and I’m so glad of it! It’s a great price, great quality, and is so cute! It’s a very nice transitional piece that can take you through multiple seasons. Highly recommend!
Cute, fashionable!
Perfect fit.  Versatile
I really liked this top, it was super cute and flattering 10/10 recommend
Cute sweater for a warm evening. Must wear same colored tank underneath

评论概述: ** Perfect Fit and Bell Sleeves, But Ruined After One Wash**
评论详情: I was so happy to find this sweater with bell sleeves—it was exactly what I was looking for! The fit is absolutely perfect, and the style is super cute. I thought I’d found a new favorite.  Unfortunately, after just one wash (following the care instructions exactly), the sweater was completely ruined. It got all stretched out and lost its shape, making it unwearable. I’m really disappointed because it had so much potential, but the quality just isn’t there.  Great design, but sadly, it didn’t hold up at all.
This is s a beautiful light weight sweater and can’t wait until the weather cools down just a bit so I can wear it!!

I get an absurd number of compliments on this sweater whenever I wear it.  I just use it to pop over strappy summer dresses or halters.  I'm 5'8 and the medium is long in both arms and torso - great for me, but not for the petite.  Bought another in blue.

I bought one size bigger for an oversized fit, but I plan to buy a second one in my size soon! It’s honestly perfect! Comfortable, versatile, not too warm but not cold either. The color is so perfect! Totally worth the money! I want to buy it in every color!!

Love this sweater! I purchased in both the white and black. Usually order large, I'm tall, 36DD but went with medium, glad I did. Fit perfectly. Sleeves were def long enough and will lay flat to dry. Whote is a true white. Very comfortable and versatile,  goes with any bottom you pair it with.
This shirt is so cute. It fits true to size

This sweater fit great, I ordered a a size medium in the cream and pink color they were both  on sale for $21 each and they both are beautiful, very flattering sleeve and the fabric  is so soft. Good price value, highly recommended

I bought this for a trip to Europe where the weathee would run cool to warm fro day to day. It was a loose crochet type weave so plenty of air got through when warm, but also provided a little more coverage when temps got cooler. Plus it was versatile for casual to a little more dressy.
Would give us five stars because it is a cute sweater however, it is white. Clearly this is a return from a previous customer cause make up is all over the collar. Please kindly send replacement.

This sweater did not disappoint at all. I ordered size small thinking it would be a bit big, as I'm usually an XS, but that size was not offered. The small fits great and this sweater can take you well into the Fall and probably some of the winter.  It's very pretty, really comfortable and it goes with everything from skirts to shorts to dress pants.  I highly recommend.

This is a really cute shirt & it’s really versatile. You can easily dress it up or down! I’m 5’3 & 150 lbs & ordered a medium - after trying it on I would’ve ordered a small instead (unless you want a really loose fit). Just a little longer than expected.
Stylish, lightweight, and fun!

I really liked the way it looked and it’s definitely gonna be cute for layering, I was worried because of the one video review but I think if you’re worried about it looking too “flimsy” just size down! I like the color and the quality is good
The shade of pink is just perfect! I wore this on a very hot day and it was still very comfortable! It’s lightweight and breathable! The quality is very good!
Searched for a summer sweater and this is it. Lightweight. Flattering and lays so well. I sized up because I wanted it a little bigger. Just love it and will go back for other colors.
Yes the arms are long  but I love that. This sweater is adorable.

评论概述: Love this sweater. I have the perfect tank to go under it.
评论详情: This sweater is so nice. Perfect for a summer dinner sweater. It’s the best color. Looks great with white shorts.
Cute and comfortable.  The color is gorgeous.  Fit as expected.

Really cute top.  Great for cooler spring, summer, or fall days.  Bought larger than I would wear in order to have that lose, slouchy, comfy feel over a tank top. Washes well.  Used sweater bag in front load machine and air dried flat.  You do need to treat this "gently" as the crochet is wide and not a tight knit, but that's what gives it that great look.  It can snag easily, so just be aware of that.  Highly recommend.
I love this sweater it is cute and comfortable the holes aren’t too big where it looks weird but there big enough to know they’re there and airy.
Perfect Style & Fit. 💙
This sweater is so cute, and great for a coverup at the beach or a comfy top! The quality is very nice, and it's fits a little oversized. It's not too heavy, and it's very lightweight.
Great product fits perfect so comfy. Dress up or down. Love it will order another

评论用户: The quality you would expect from the price range & the comfort & sturdiness you'd hope for in this price range. Both comfortable & sturdy. They look nice too.
评论详情: I like this sweater but it runs short & did shrink in the wash. I don't wear it much. Maybe over a middie dress would be cute.
Super cute, looks far more costly than the price paid. Very happy with it. Be aware that it's pretty long - tucks well, but it is definitely hip-length
Cute and well made summer sweater.  Can dress up or down.

I've been searching for a couple years for a summer sweater that is lightweight, soft, breathable, but actually offers some coverage. This is the perfect sweater and I'm obsessed. Great for throwing over a tank top, the cotton blend is incredibly soft, light, and breathable. The knit pattern offers breezy airflow without showing off too much skin. I am impressed with the quality as well and will, for sure, be buying a couple more.
I love this sweater for spring and summer. Coastal weather cover is lightweight and stylish. I wear it over tank tops or sun dresses. Looks super cute with shorts and skirts.

This is the prefect spring/summer/fall sweater!! Great with a tank underneath and I love the bell sleeves! Can be dressed up with pants and shoes for work or dressed down with short and jeans. Have 3 colors so far!!
Lots of compliments, can wear to work very dressy
This is really nice when worn over a shirt or by itself. The cut and style is very nice and looks very flattering.
Return because it was so cheap
This sweater is exactly as pictured. Good quality and I love the sleeves.
I really like this sweater. The sleeves are a bit long and floppy, but it is really cute
Looks beautiful on with a black bra

评论概述: Super cute but the sleeves were too long
评论详情: Loved the look of this sweater but I ended up returning because the sleeves were way to long for me
Super soft and cozy lightweight sweater!  Sweet sleeves with the open style, very flowy and lightweight.  A little cropped, but very cute with shorts or jeans.  Nice color.  Fits true to size.
This top is really cute and fits well. I think it’s cuter than in the picture. You do have to be careful not to snag it though! Great value for the price!
Love this sweater - fit is nice and it’s comfy
Love this sweater. It’s versatile and you could dress it down with jeans or dress it up with a trendy nude satin skirt or wide legged pants. Love it. Will need a jacket or coat on top for warmth.

This top is adorable! I wear it with a pale pink tank. It is a little itchy. I love the long sleeves. I have long arms and this fits so well. It is made well. I have worn it many times as well as loaned it out a couple times, and it has never pilled or snagged.

It doesn’t really look and flow like the picture but nevertheless still cute. The material feels a bit “stiff” so it’s not super comfortable but it’s ok. It looks and wears much better after a few washes- which is a good sign!
I was surprised to find that this sweater doesn't fit the way it looks in the ad.  It is much longer in the torso than expected, which I found to be disappointing.
I would not recommend.

This sweater looks exactly as pictured, and the design is very cute. The reason I took off a star from this review is because the sweater is just slightly larger than I would have liked. I ordered a medium, and usually wear a size small/medium in other sweaters, depending on how I want them to fit. Because I wanted this to be kind of oversized, I ordered a medium. However, when it came it I realized it's probably a bit TOO oversized and regretted getting a medium. If you want a overused fit, I suggest staying true to your usual sizing because the sweater itself runs large. Otherwise, I love the look of this sweater. The material is very comfy and lightweight, and it looks super beachy.

评论概述: lightweight, more of a beach coverup feel
评论详情: this sweater is lightweight and the material is nice.  it was not as flattering on me when paired with jeans, but could see myself wearing it as a beach cover up.
Quality of the sweater is very good. Light weight and price is very good. Fits true to size
Cute and true to size, I should have went down a size. But cute
This sweater fits just as expected. It looks exactly how the picture says it’s supposed to.

Love this sweater for wearing over tanks and T's. In cooler weather, I wear it with long sleeve tops. It's fun to wear bright colors under the loosely woven black crochet. It's light enough to wear indoors and not make me hot, and when worn with a heavier top underneath, it's very warm on a colder day. Love the long sleeves! Completely recommended.

The sleeves are overly overly large and long. My hands are hidden and I have to pull up a lot... also  first time wearing and already has a snag... cute but not perfect. Also wear a shirt under so your bra doesn't show
Super nice loose-weave sweater.  Light weight tunic style with bell sleeves.  Very comfortable cotton blend.  Fit great and got lots of compliments.

This lightweight sweater is really cute on. The sleeves bell out and hit just right, not covering my hands like I thought they might. Love the knit design and crocheted Look. Fits just right and I ordered a small.  Seems like it will last many seasons.

评论概述: Not a fan of how long the arms hang.
评论详情: I really wanted to like this. I still have a couple of ways I am thinking I can wear it but I don't know if I can get passed the way the arms hang. I think I might keep it to go over my workout clothes. I think I would like it more if I got a size smaller.

Material is soft. Fit is true to size. I will wear a tank under it but the top is super cute and comfortable. I love sleeves on the longer side and the flare at the end of this is fun and stylish. Great addition to the closet.
Love this sweater.  Fits perfectly.  Very well made.  Very comfortable and keeps me warm.

I had hopes for this sweater but ultimately decided I do not like it. It does not look flattering on me. The sleeves don’t stay up if you pull them up. I do not see myself wearing this out or even at home. Maybe they will appeal to others, but not me.

First, if you want an oversized look, I suggest you size up like I did. I got a large when my size is typically a medium or small, and this fits amazing. I love the way the sleeves flare out on the end. This can be the perfect swim cover up, or as a normal sweater! The material is soft and it feels like very nice quality. I would order this in several colors.
I loved this sweater top.  Soft and cozy. Runs true to size.  Love the feel of it.  I washed it and it didn't shrink. A must add to your sweater collection

评论概述: Cute crochet top but the material is thin.
评论详情: Cute crochet top but the material is thin which means you will need to hand wash it if your washer has an agitator.

I live in southern California, so fall is basically summer with an earlier sunset and sometimes lower temps. I'm always desperate for sweaters by mid Sept or so, so this is a great option. It has a very open weave, meaning it's very airy and not warm. I personally love the cut, especially the wider sleeves--has kind of a witchy feel to it. Looks very cute over a tank. Priced well for what you get.
This is a really pretty feminine sweater that is great for a cooler summer day.
Material is soft on skin not itchy!!  color is very flattering, super easy to dress up or down!!  Does have a bit more stretch than I anticipated, but that is ok.
Super cute and comfortable for any occasion. It’s a bit bulkier than expected but it still provides decent coverage in bathing suits.

Available in Multiple Sizes:  The availability of multiple sizes, including Small as in this review, ensures a customized fit for different body types. It's a thoughtful touch that caters to a wide range of fashion preferences.  In conclusion, Sidefeel's 2023 Fall Crochet Tops are a must-have for anyone looking to make a fashion statement this fall. Their chic crochet design, lightweight comfort, versatility, oversized knit style, and availability in multiple sizes make them an outstanding choice for your fall wardrobe. Don't miss out on the opportunity to elevate your fall fashion game with Sidefeel's Crochet Tops!
This is a great lightweight sweater that's soft, comfortable, and fits great. I love the flowy sleeves and baggy fit. I have a 40 inch chest and got a size large.
This top fits as expected and is light and airy. You'll want to wear a tank under it too avoid showing more than you intended, but it's a cute piece and worth the extra layer.
Gorgeous turquoise sweater that has the coolest bell sleeves.  Nice longer length and the fit is true to size fit.  Very stylish.

I like this to throw over a tank but it isn’t going to provide you any warmth. Would make a great swim suit cover up (maybe that is the intent). The arms are very wide the entire length of the sleeve.
